What The Famous is a little fun game created to mess around with friends or just to have a few laughts a day. It is not meant to be taken seriously when having to face real life decisions. \n\nPlease do note that the characters in this application are fictional and should not be taken as a direct endorsement from anyone who resembles him or her. What the Famous is not the official application of any famous person.
